title: About Me
institute: Institute of Geography and Regional Science

question&answer.question: What is my research interest?
question&answer.answer: Public Participatory Geographic Information Systems (PPGIS), Civic-Technologies, Virtual Geographic Environement (3D), Human-Computer Interaction, Spatial Data Science & Visualization, Emerging Technologies, Digital Twin, and Urban Participatory Planning.

question&answer.question: What are the cool libraries I use?
question&answer.answer: DuckDB, KeplerGL, PostGIS, Lonboard, Vue.js, Cesium.js, and more..

question&answer.question: What is my productivity stack?
question&answer.answer: Raycast, Arc, Capacities, ClickUp, Perplexity, VSCode, Windsurf, Docker, JupyterLab, and Git.
